name: Dice Heads
description:
Dice Heads Die dice, Die!

An explorer went to discover the secrets of the long abandoned ruined of the cult of die,  only to find out they were not alone... Good thing they bought a gun with them!

This game is for the GMTK game jam 2022, It was made  within 48 hours  and uses a mix of assets I  made within the time frame and assets from Unreal Engines Megascasns library. I set out to make a game inspired  by COD Zombies. I think I succeeded but wish I   had time to implement more game mechanics to do with chance. With more time I was going to make it so the big dice in the main room could be rolled for random events to happen, some good, some bad.

Thanks for playing! Let me know which wave you got to or if you beat the game! 

Known Bugs;

- Zombies sometimes group up and get stuck outside entrance zones

- Some lighting issues
